location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.2121 of 1855 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of receipt of Kemballâ€™s earlier letter relating to an act of piracy committed against a Bahraini vessel off the Arab coast, and British efforts to trace the perpetrators. Anderson writes that his Lordship in Council approves of the measures thus far taken by Kemball, and anticipates a further report on the matter in due course.
